meanings.definition: A small, red berry that grows on certain types of shrubs.
meanings.sent1: I picked a ripe foxberry from the bush.
meanings.sent2: The foxberry tasted sweet and juicy.
meanings.sent3: The foxberry rolled off the table and bounced on the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her lips were as red as a foxberry in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The foxberry bush was covered in clusters of vibrant red fruits.

meanings.definition: The fruit of a foxberry shrub.
meanings.sent1: She made a delicious pie using foxberries.
meanings.sent2: The foxberry was the perfect addition to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The foxberry jumped out of the bowl and started dancing.
meanings.sent4: The foxberry was a tiny explosion of flavor in his mouth.
meanings.sent5: Each foxberry was like a tiny gem on the shrub.

meanings.sent1: The foxberry plant needs plenty of sunlight to thrive.
meanings.sent2: The foxberry shrub was full of blossoms in the spring.
meanings.sent3: The foxberry plant whispered secrets to the other plants.
meanings.sent4: The foxberry bush stood tall and proud in the garden.
meanings.sent5: The foxberry plant's leaves rustled in the gentle breeze.
